attributes.action: stop payroll companies taking employers contribution NI from their employees pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some payroll companies (or other companies) extract the employers NI contributions from the salary of their employees before they calculate tax and employees NI contributions. This means that the employee pays both contributions. This is disgraceful practice and reduces the employees salary so that the salary or wage the employee thought they were receiving is in fact a lie.
